amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress on the nonproliferation of ballistic missiles.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3449 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3449 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Levin to Amendment SA 3322. (consideration: CR S6695, S6704-6705; text: CR S6695) To express the sense of Congress on the nonproliferation of ballistic missiles.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3449 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Levin to Amendment SA 3322.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3449 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
